snippet: Uninsured Americans disapprove of President Obama’s health care law at nearly the same rate as those with health insurance, the new poll shows.
lead_paragraph: Uninsured Americans disapprove of President Obama’s health care law at nearly the same rate as those with health insurance, the new poll shows.

headline.main: The Latest New York Times/CBS News Polling Results
